author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...LORENA MOVING A LITTLE SLOWER TOWARD THE NORTHWEST... ...LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING EXPECTED ACROSS BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR AND SOUTHWESTERN SONORA...
summary: ...LORENA MOVING A LITTLE SLOWER TOWARD THE NORTHWEST... ...LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING EXPECTED ACROSS BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR AND SOUTHWESTERN SONORA... As of 5:00 PM MST Wed Sep 03 the center of Lorena was located near 23.1, -112.9 with movement NW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 985 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...LORENA MOVING A LITTLE SLOWER TOWARD THE NORTHWEST... ...LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING EXPECTED ACROSS BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR AND SOUTHWESTERN SONORA... As of 5:00 PM MST Wed Sep 03 the center of Lorena was located near 23.1, -112.9 with movement NW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 985 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Lorena (EP2/EP122025)
